sn35.116:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antam nateyyam, dattheyyam, patteyyanti vadami.
sn35.116:1.2: Na ca panaham, bhikkhave, appatva lokassa antam dukkhassa antakiriyam vadami”ti.
sn35.116:1.3: Idam vatva bhagava utthayasana viharam pavisi.
sn35.116:1.4: Atha kho tesam bhikkhunam acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
sn35.116:1.5: “idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
sn35.116:1.6: ‘“naham, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antam nateyyam, dattheyyam, patteyyan”ti vadami.
sn35.116:1.7: Na ca panaham, bhikkhave, appatva lokassa antam dukkhassa antakiriyam vadami’ti.
sn35.116:1.8: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya”ti?
sn35.116:2.2: “ayam kho ayasma anando satthu ceva samvannito, sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
sn35.116:2.3: Pahoti cayasma anando imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
sn35.116:2.4: Yannuna mayam yenayasma anando tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etamattham patipuccheyyama”ti.
sn35.116:3.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu yenayasma anando tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodimsu.
sn35.116:3.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu ayasmantam anandam etadavocum:
sn35.116:4.1: “Idam kho no, avuso ananda, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
sn35.116:4.2: ‘naham, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antam nateyyam, dattheyyam, patteyyanti vadami.
sn35.116:4.3: Na ca panaham, bhikkhave, appatva lokassa antam dukkhassa antakiriyam vadami’ti.
sn35.116:4.4: Tesam no, avuso, amhakam acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
sn35.116:4.5: ‘idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho—
sn35.116:4.6: naham, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antam nateyyam, dattheyyam, patteyyanti vadami.
sn35.116:4.7: Na ca panaham, bhikkhave, appatva lokassa antam dukkhassa antakiriyam vadamiti.
sn35.116:4.8: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya’ti?
sn35.116:4.10: ‘ayam kho, avuso, ayasma anando satthu ceva samvannito, sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
sn35.116:4.11: Pahoti cayasma anando imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
sn35.116:4.12: Yannuna mayam yenayasma anando tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etamattham patipuccheyyama’ti.
sn35.116:5.1: “Seyyathapi, avuso, puriso saratthiko saragavesi sarapariyesanam caramano mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato atikkammeva, mulam atikkammeva, khandham sakhapalase saram pariyesitabbam manneyya;
sn35.116:5.2: evam sampadamidam ayasmantanam satthari sammukhibhute tam bhagavantam atisitva amhe etamattham patipucchitabbam mannatha.
sn35.116:5.3: So havuso, bhagava janam janati, passam passati—
sn35.116:5.4: cakkhubhuto, nanabhuto, dhammabhuto, brahmabhuto, vatta, pavatta, atthassa ninneta, amatassa data, dhammassami, tathagato.
sn35.116:5.5: So ceva panetassa kalo ahosi yam bhagavantamyeva etamattham patipuccheyyatha.
sn35.116:5.6: Yatha vo bhagava byakareyya tatha vo dhareyyatha”ti.
sn35.116:6.1: “Addhavuso ananda, bhagava janam janati, passam passati—
sn35.116:6.2: cakkhubhuto, nanabhuto, dhammabhuto, brahmabhuto, vatta, pavatta, atthassa ninneta, amatassa data, dhammassami, tathagato.
sn35.116:6.3: So ceva panetassa kalo ahosi yam bhagavantamyeva etamattham patipuccheyyama.
sn35.116:6.4: Yatha no bhagava byakareyya tatha nam dhareyyama.
sn35.116:6.5: Api cayasma anando satthu ceva samvannito, sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
sn35.116:6.6: Pahoti cayasma anando imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
sn35.116:7.2: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato anandassa paccassosum.
sn35.116:8.1: “Yam kho vo, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
sn35.116:8.2: ‘naham, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antam nateyyam, dattheyyam, patteyyanti vadami.
sn35.116:8.3: Na ca panaham, bhikkhave, appatva lokassa antam dukkhassa antakiriyam vadami’ti,
sn35.116:8.4: imassa khvaham, avuso, bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham ajanami.
sn35.116:8.5: Yena kho, avuso, lokasmim lokasanni hoti lokamani—
sn35.116:8.7: Kena cavuso, lokasmim lokasanni hoti lokamani?
sn35.116:8.8: Cakkhuna kho, avuso, lokasmim lokasanni hoti lokamani.
sn35.116:8.11: jivhaya kho, avuso, lokasmim lokasanni hoti lokamani.
sn35.116:8.13: manena kho, avuso, lokasmim lokasanni hoti lokamani.
sn35.116:8.14: Yena kho, avuso, lokasmim lokasanni hoti lokamani—
sn35.116:8.16: Yam kho vo, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
sn35.116:8.17: ‘naham, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antam nateyyam, dattheyyam, patteyyanti vadami.
sn35.116:8.18: Na ca panaham, bhikkhave, appatva lokassa antam dukkhassa antakiriyam vadami’ti,
sn35.116:8.19: imassa khvaham, avuso, bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa evam vittharena attham ajanami.
sn35.116:8.20: Akankhamana ca pana tumhe ayasmanto bhagavantamyeva upasankamitva etamattham patipuccheyyatha.
sn35.116:8.21: Yatha vo bhagava byakaroti tatha nam dhareyyatha”ti.
sn35.116:9.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato anandassa patissutva utthayasana yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn35.116:10.1: “Yam kho no, bhante, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
sn35.116:10.2: ‘naham, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antam nateyyam, dattheyyam, patteyyanti vadami.
sn35.116:10.3: Na ca panaham, bhikkhave, appatva lokassa antam dukkhassa antakiriyam vadami’ti.
sn35.116:10.4: Tesam no, bhante, amhakam acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
sn35.116:10.5: ‘idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho—
sn35.116:10.6: naham, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa antam nateyyam, dattheyyam, patteyyanti vadami.
sn35.116:10.7: Na ca panaham, bhikkhave, appatva lokassa antam dukkhassa antakiriyam vadamiti.
sn35.116:10.8: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya’ti?
sn35.116:10.10: ‘ayam kho ayasma anando satthu ceva samvannito, sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
sn35.116:10.11: Pahoti cayasma anando imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
sn35.116:10.12: Yannuna mayam yenayasma anando tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etamattham patipuccheyyama’ti.
sn35.116:10.13: Atha kho mayam, bhante, yenayasma anando tenupasankamimha; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etamattham patipucchimha.
sn35.116:10.14: Tesam no, bhante, ayasmata anandena imehi akarehi imehi padehi imehi byanjanehi attho vibhatto”ti.
sn35.116:11.2: Mancepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamattham patipuccheyyatha, ahampi tam evamevam byakareyyam yatha tam anandena byakatam.
sn35.116:11.3: Eso cevetassa attho, evanca nam dhareyyatha”ti.
